snippet: Prosper plans to announce on Monday that it has raised $70 million in a new fundraising round, one led by the investment firm Francisco Partners.
abstract: Prosper plans to announce on Monday that it has raised $70 million in a new fundraising round, one led by the investment firm Francisco Partners.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Prosper, a Peer-to-Peer Lender, Raises $70 Million
